testsuite.name: As a user I want to make bookings in travelocity

testcase.name: Search hotel booking in travelocity not exists
Reservation date hotel with more 28 days
Send text message for download App success

failure.message: The text message is no expected - Expected the message success Expected: is <true> but: was <false>

testcase.failure: The text message is no expected - Expected the message success Expected: is <true> but: was <false>
testcase.system-err: The text message is no expected - Expected the message success Expected: is <true> but: was <false> com.cinte.reto_travelocity.stepdefinitions.ReservationsDefinitions.iVerifyThatTheMessageAppear(ReservationsDefinitions.java:84) ✽.I verify that the message "We’ve sent you a text message with a link to download the app." appear(src/test/resources/features/reservations.feature:48)

testcase.name: Send text message with phone number already used
Send text message without specify phone number
Search for flights without selecting origin or destination
Search multiple flights without selecting any kind of information
Search vehicle to rent without checking any option
Find transportation to the airport with wrong information
Make package reservation by selecting Hotels and Flights
Make package reservation by selecting Hotels and Cars
Make package reservation by selecting Flights and Cars
